original_text: Thus they inclosed the Benjamites round about, and chased them, and trode them down with ease over against Gibeah toward the sunrising.
korean_text: 그들이 베냐민 사람을 에워싸고 기브아 앞 동쪽까지 추격하며 그 쉬는 곳에서 짓밟으매

sentences.original_text: Thus they inclosed the Benjamites round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들은 베냐민 사람들을四面八方으로 에워쌌다

sentences.original_text: and trode them down with ease
over against Gibeah toward the sunrising
